Verses.15: Let the peace of Christ rule in your hearts. The peace that you were called to as one body. And be thankful.
Verses.16: Let the word of Christ dwell within you in its richness! Teach and admonish one another with all wisdom; with psalms, hymns, and spiritual songs. Do this while singing to God with thankfulness in your hearts.
Verses.17: Whatever you do in word or deed, do it all in the name of the Lord Jesus. Giving thanks through Him to God the Father.

Changes: 2023-10-16 - Paul Prins: First translation of verses 15-17.
